stillgfx(574, absY, absX); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Hitpoints."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14083) { //ranging stillgfx(472, absY, absX); stillgfx(474, absY, absX); stillgfx(20, absY, absX); stillgfx(21, absY, absX); stillgfx(22, absY, absX); stillgfx(23, absY, absX); stillgfx(24, absY, absX); stillgfx(25, absY, absX); stillgfx(26, absY, absX); and add a command similar to this
